verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> "How long will you <S%H56>mourn<s%> for <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> since I have <S%H3988>rejected<s%> him from being <S%H4427>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> <S%H4390>Fill<s%> your <S%H7161>horn<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H3212>go.<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> you to <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> the <S%H1022>Bethlehemite;<s%> for I have <S%H7200>provided<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> for myself among his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "How can I <S%H3212>go?<s%> If <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> <S%H2026>it,<s%> he will kill <S%H3068>me.<s%>" Yahweh <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> a <S%H1241>heifer<s%> with <S%H3027>you,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> I have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H7121>Call<s%> <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> to the <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> and I will <S%H3045>show<s%> you what you shall <S%H6213>do.<s%> You shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> to me him whom I name to <S%H559>you.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%> The <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7125>came<s%> to meet him <S%H2729>trembling,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Do you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably?<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7965>"Peaceably;<s%> I have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> <S%H935>yourselves,<s%> and come with me to the <S%H2077>sacrifice.<s%>" He <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> them to the <S%H2077>sacrifice.<s%>
It <S%H935>happened,<s%> when they had come, that he <S%H7200>looked<s%> at <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Surely <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s anointed is before <S%H4899>him.<s%>"

But <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H5027>"Don't<s%> look on his <S%H4758>face,<s%> or on the <S%H1364>height<s%> of his <S%H6967>stature;<s%> because I have <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H120>him:<s%> for I see not as man <S%H7200>sees;<s%> for <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7200>looks<s%> at the outward <S%H5869>appearance,<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>looks<s%> at the <S%H3824>heart.<s%>"

Then <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H41>Abinadab,<s%> and made him <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Neither has <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> chosen this <S%H977>one.<s%>"
Then <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> made <S%H8048>Shammah<s%> to pass <S%H5674>by.<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Neither has <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> chosen this <S%H977>one.<s%>"

<S%H3448>Jesse<s%> made <S%H7651>seven<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> has not chosen <S%H977>these.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> "Are <S%H8552>all<s%> your <S%H5288>children<s%> <S%H559>here?<s%>" He said, "There <S%H7604>remains<s%> yet the <S%H6996>youngest,<s%> and <S%H7462>behold,<s%> he is keeping the <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>" <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> <S%H7971>"Send<s%> and <S%H3947>get<s%> <S%H5437>him;<s%> for we will not sit down until he <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H6311>here.<s%>"

He <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and brought him <S%H935>in.<s%> Now he was <S%H132>ruddy,<s%> and <S%H5973>withal<s%> of a <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H5869>face,<s%> and <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H7210>to<s%> look <S%H3068>on.<s%> Yahweh <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> anoint <S%H4886>him;<s%> for this is he."

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of his <S%H251>brothers:<s%> and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> mightily on <S%H1732>David<s%> from that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H4605>forward.<s%> So <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%>
Now the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5493>departed<s%> from <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> troubled <S%H1204>him.<s%>
<S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7451>him,<s%> "See now, an evil <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from <S%H430>God<s%> troubles <S%H1204>you.<s%>

Let our <S%H113>lord<s%> now <S%H559>command<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> who are <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1245>you,<s%> to seek out a <S%H376>man<s%> who is a <S%H3045>skillful<s%> <S%H5059>player<s%> on the <S%H3658>harp.<s%> It shall <S%H7451>happen,<s%> when the evil <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from <S%H430>God<s%> is on <S%H5059>you,<s%> that he shall play with his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and you shall be <S%H2895>well.<s%>"
<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H7200>"Provide<s%> me now a <S%H376>man<s%> who can <S%H5059>play<s%> <S%H3190>well,<s%> and bring him to <S%H935>me.<s%>"

Then <S%H259>one<s%> of the young men <S%H6030>answered,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> I have seen a <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> the <S%H1022>Bethlehemite,<s%> who is <S%H3045>skillful<s%> in <S%H5059>playing,<s%> a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>man<s%> of <S%H4421>valor,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H995>prudent<s%> in <S%H1697>speech,<s%> and a <S%H8389>comely<s%> <S%H376>person;<s%> and Yahweh is with <S%H3068>him.<s%>"

Therefore <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7971>"Send<s%> me <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1121>son,<s%> who is with the <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>"

<S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H2543>donkey<s%> loaded with <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and a <S%H4997>bottle<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H259>a<s%> young <S%H1423>goat,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H157>him.<s%> He loved him <S%H3966>greatly;<s%> and he became his armor <S%H5375>bearer.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Please let <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4672>me;<s%> for he has found <S%H2580>favor<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight.<s%>"

It <S%H7307>happened,<s%> when the spirit from <S%H430>God<s%> was on <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3658>harp,<s%> and <S%H5059>played<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> so <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H7304>refreshed,<s%> and was <S%H2895>well,<s%> and the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> departed from <S%H5493>him.<s%>
